title: My ultimate cottage pie
ingredients: ['olive oil, for frying', '2 onions, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '500g lean minced beef', '1 glass red wine', '3 tablespoons dark soy sauce', '100g tomato puree', '2 teaspoons garlic puree', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 tomato, chopped', '2 beef stock cubes', '5 medium potatoes', '2 low fat Dairylea triangles', '1 handful grated Cheddar cheese', '1 tomato, sliced', '40g salted butter']
